Body:
identityStorage = MemoryIdentityStorage()
privateKeyStorage = MemoryPrivateKeyStorage()
identityManager = IdentityManager(identityStorage, privateKeyStorage)
keyName = Name('/test/ksk-1457560485494')
identityStorage.addKey(keyName, KeyType.RSA, Blob(PUBLIC_KEY))
subjectDescriptions = []
subjectDescriptions.append(CertificateSubjectDescription(TEST_OID, 'TEST NAME')
    )
newCertificate = identityManager.prepareUnsignedIdentityCertificate(keyName,
    keyName.getPrefix(1), self.toyCertNotBefore, self.toyCertNotAfter,
    subjectDescriptions)
newCertificate.setName(Name(newCertificate.getName().getPrefix(-1).append(
    self.toyCert.getName().get(-1))))
certificateCopy = IdentityCertificate(newCertificate)
self.assertEqual(str(self.toyCert), str(certificateCopy),
    'Prepared unsigned certificate dump does not have the expected format')
